elements.name: reason
elements.title: What is the reason for this consultation?

elements.name: therapy_preference
elements.title: What type of therapy are you interested in? (if you're not sure, just pick 'I Don't Know')

elements.name: prev_consult
elements.title: Have you ever consulted with a mental health professional before?
choices: I have consulted but did not receive therapy
I have consulted and did receive therapy in the past
I have consulted and did receive therapy during multiple periods in the past

elements.name: medication
elements.title: Are you taking any psychiatric medication?

elements.name: suicide_attempt
elements.title: Have you self-injured or self-harmed in the past 12 months?

elements.name: availability
elements.title: When are you available to meet your therapist? (You can select more than one)

elements.name: location_preference
elements.title: At which MindSpace location(s) are you willing to attend meetings? (You can select more than one)

elements.name: language
elements.title: What is your preferred language for therapy?
choices: Either is fine (may lead to being seen sooner)
Referral from a physician (if so, please indicate the name of your physician in the section below)
Referral from another health care professional
Referral from a friend, colleague, or family member
Conference or public appearance by MindSpace staff
elements.name: referral
elements.title: How did you hear about the clinic?

elements.name: referral_note
elements.title: If you were referred by a physician, please list their name here

elements.name: other_info
elements.title: Is there anything else you think we should know?
